replies.author: 1451599023zhao
replies.txt_content:
xll_x66 发表于 2015-7-29 17:04
一般都是没给权限，你把你给权限的指令和配置文件夹发来看看？
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&e原始大陆服务器小菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 3

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'menu'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 340
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


tutorial:
  COMMAND: 'open:插件教程.yml'
  NAME: '&a[+] 教程 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '内容'
  ID: 340
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


example:
  COMMAND: 'open:菜单.yml'
  NAME: '&e[++] 菜单 [++]'
  LORE:
    - '修改'
  ID: 399
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 2


admin:
  COMMAND: 'open:管理员控制台.yml'
  NAME: '&c[+] 控制台 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '管理员控制台'
    - 'op专用'
  ID: 137
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 1


xyx:
  COMMAND: 'open:小游戏.yml'
  NAME: '&c[+] 小游戏界面 [+]'
  LORE:
  ID: 119
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 3

这个已给

replies.author: Z1195138716
replies.txt_content:
Z1195138716 发表于 2015-7-29 14:52
一开始使用书来打开如果不行的话说明插件在你服务器上没有运行
我告诉你 /mangaddp builder chestcommands.item.main-menu.yml
这样玩家就能打开了还望楼主给我最佳
